title: Simplification of Product Model and Implementation in all Systems
description:
Description
  For whom Telekom
who has to fulfill the order of a managed WAN / LAN / WiFi service
provides hardware and the service itself to
a customer
for Installation and using the service
Different from Manual processes
optimizing process costs, process speed, transparency by simplification and automation
Hypothesis for the business result After ordering, customer will have the system in place at a very short realization time.
Non functional requirements  
Supplementary information Basis for all processes should be the processes for Juniper SD-LAN/WiFi
  The current Product Model and related Architecture of current mode of operations (CMO) shall be simplified exposing less features to the ServiceNow Portal (internal and external) using in addition the native vendor portal for additional technical enrichment of parameters in future mode of operations (FMO) and shall be implemented in all systems. For that purpose the Dataflow of Inventory of CMO shall be modified to FMO as shown in picture slide 3 attached.
                  

Business Scope:
The current Product Model and related Architecture of current mode of operations (CMO) shall be simplified exposing less technical features to the ServiceNow Portal (internal and external) using in addition the native vendor portals for additional technical enrichment of parameters in future mode of operations (FMO) and shall be implemented in all systems. For that purpose the Dataflow of Inventory of CMO shall be modified to FMO as shown in picture.

This will lead to a more consistent and less change prone PO/PS layer which is required to be implemented in multiple tools consistently (P+, CPQ, SN, ...). Thus to add a feature only a smaller portion of the tool chain will be affected reducing the implementation effort.
acceptance_criteria: Exploration phase FMO Simplification of Product Model shall be done and documented
The FMO Dataflow of Inventory for new Architecture using also MIST Portal for technical network configuration is done and documented
FMO Simplification of Product Model shall be implemented in all systems and demonstrated in UAT.
The FMO Dataflow of Inventory for new Architecture using also MIST Portal for technical network configuration is set up and tested in UAT test.
